code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AllProducts=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);async function getallpro(){try{let res=await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:1214/api/products/users");setData(res.data.users);}catch(error){console.log(error);}}useEffect(()=>{getallpro();},[data]);async function Delete(id){try{await axios.delete("http://127.0.0.1:1214/api/products/del/".concat(id));window.location.reload();}catch(error){alert(error.response.data.Message);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{cellPadding:10,className:"table table-hover text-dark container mt-5 ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center display-4 mt-5",children:"List of active products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Instock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]}),data.map(x=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Price," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Category," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Instock," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Image," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger mx-2",onClick:()=>Delete(x._id),children:" Delete "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success my-2",children:" Edit "})]})});})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admindashboard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-dark",children:"Back to dashboard"})})})]});};export default AllProducts;
